title: Prescribe limitations on intercollegiate athlete contracts
subject: Education
Higher Education
Occupational Licensing and Regulation

abstracts.abstract: To amend section 4771.12 and to enact sections 3376.14 and 4771.021 of the Revised Code to prescribe limitations with respect to certain contracts entered into with intercollegiate athletes.

other_titles.title: To amend section 4771.12 and to enact sections 3376.14 and 4771.021 of the Revised Code to prescribe limitations with respect to certain contracts entered into with intercollegiate athletes.
